snippet.title: Virtual High School Life Simulator
snippet.description:
Download Game: http://bit.ly/2Mfo6IF

Let's enjoy the high school virtual life just like old school days!

Virtual high school life simulator is an adventure pack school game, where you will remember your school life days while playing this interesting virtual simulation. Dress up for going to school and eat your breakfast on time. Reach at high school on time in your favorite scooty and attend the lecture in the virtual school world.

Enjoy the most incredible virtual school simulation with thrilling missions to play with. Your school campus is huge, and have many classrooms, auditorium, cafeteria, gym, corridor, etc. Meet with friends, go to the classroom and attend the lecture carefully. Selfie Time! Take a selfie with your group friends and save them in your school dairy. Avoid fighting students and enjoy your time with your friends in high school life simulation. 

Smooth controls and attractive missions in school virtual simulator made this game addictive for all school game lovers as well as virtual game fans. Drop your friend Tina from high school to her home with the help of your scooty. Increase your school memories and take a selfie with your teachers, class fellow and friends to save these memories in your gallery. Stop the fight scenes of the bully students and complain to the principal about these students. 

Key Features:

• Play as a Virtual High School Girl or Virtual Boy
• Select your gender to enjoy school life
• Impulsive controls with amazing sounds effects
• Challenging High School tasks with extreme time limit
• Capture beautiful school moments in your camera

In School life, you can enjoy the group study with your friends in the classroom and by sitting over the green grassy playground of the campus. Go to high school canteen and eat lunch with your friends. It is the best game for your kids to perform certain tasks which they would face in their high school. Just make a wonderful entry in the gaming world of high school virtual world simulator.

Virtual school Teacher holds a Surprise Quiz in school simulator. Hurry to the classroom & get prepared for the test. Show your homework & help your class fellows to complete their work easily while playing virtual school boy & girl life simulator. Go to the lab and do some experiments for chemistry & biology subject in a life simulation game. Many more missions are also waiting in School Virtual Simulator.
